channel.title: Help with monster drops
channel.description:
I'm trying to make my training npcs drop items when they die. And its not working. I thought i added them to npcdrops.cfg, but it didnt work..
this is what i put in npcdrps.cfg if thats even the right place [code]npcdrop = 1676 1 995 50000 3205 1 7407 1 5699 1 1435 1 892 535 2615 1 2617 1 2621 1 2619 1 1374 1 1334 1 882 1 1292 1[/code]

item.title: Help with monster drops
item.dc:creator: @M_A_R_T_Y M A R T Y
item.description:
@M_A_R_T_Y wrote:

I’m trying to make my training npcs drop items when they die. And its not working.
I thought i added them to npcdrops.cfg, but it didnt work…

this is what i put in npcdrps.cfg if thats even the right place

npcdrop = 1676		1		995	50000	3205	1	7407	1	5699	1	1435	1	892	535	2615	1	2617	1	2621	1	2619	1	1374	1	1334	1	882	1	1292	1

Read full topic
